TextView.android:text: About BNET Global Solutions Pvt. Ltd.

BNET Global Solution Private Limited serves as the parent entity of BNET General Insurance. Since its inception in 2023, BNET Global has positioned itself as a digital-first direct-to-consumer enterprise, focusing on developing and managing technology and services platforms. With a dedicated emphasis on delivering exceptional customer experiences and harnessing innovative technology, BNET Global endeavour's to create superior customer value propositions and cultivate more immersive interactions.
BNET Insurance Broker Private Limited
No 23 KH No 187/1260/28, /2/23 Hennur Village, Kalyananagar, Bangalore North, Bangalore- 560043, Karnataka
